about_the_game:
Emberfly is a first-person horror game set in Korea.

Features

  • First-person horror - Single player in first-person perspective.

  • Exploration and puzzles - Find hidden clues and solve simple puzzles (easy).

  • Chase scenes - Run away to avoid being caught.

  • Playtime - The first playtime is about 30-60 minutes. There are 2 endings.

Story

One day, you wake up in an empty school.

You have no idea why you're here.

It's nighttime and the lights are off, so everything is dark.

I don't know why, but luckily I have a flashlight.

You have to find a way out of here.

Icons by Icons8
